title: Portuguese Proofing Tools for Microsoft Word
content:
Can anyone tell me why Microsoft Word (for the Office X) has proofing tools for most languages accept Portuguese and Brazilian Portuguese? And if you've found them could you please tell me where to get them?

 [‹ Newspaper print effect](http://web.archive.org/web/20080407194316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1997 "Go to previous forum topic") [Postscript printer ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080407194316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2032 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany
